recipe.title: Sprightly Lemon Vinaigrette
ingredients: 3 to 4 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, to taste
Freshly milled black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Whisk in the oil. Transfer to an airtight jar and screw tightly shut. Chill for up to 1 week.
